name: ThoraJansens
body:
### A friendly bot wasting peoples time and making the happy. This automatic twitter bot tweets people it finds to start conversations, and send encouragmenets. It incorporates a lot of randomness, but a snap of the resulting conversations can be seen below. The bot communicates via the twitter API and is built on the python implementation tweepy. Below are a few of the top tweets: `

@ThoraJansens not really sure why you're laughing, it's not really funny...

— ❁ʙɛɛ (@becca_norton8) February 11, 2015
` ``

@ThoraJansens If the game is #moving, I go through the house one last time to make sure everything has been safely packed away.

— National Van Lines (@NatVanLines) February 11, 2015
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
